memberdef.argsstring:
(".globl _sysCallNew 
""_sysCallNew: 
"" pusha 
"" push %ss 
"" push %ds 
"" push %es 
"" push %fs 
"" push %gs 
"" cmpl totalCalls,%eax 
"" jae invalidSysCallNew 
"" mov %esp,%ebx 
"" add $12,%ebx 
"" push (%ebx) 
"" call *systemCalls(,%eax,4) 
"" add $4,%esp 
"" jmp doneNew 
""invalidSysCallNew: 
"" call InvalidSystemCall 
""doneNew: 
"" pop %gs 
"" pop %fs 
"" pop %es 
"" pop %ds 
"" pop %ss 
"" popa 
"" iret 
")
memberdef.name: asm

param.type:
